result.eng: Half of that amount would do.
result.ga: Dhéanfadh leath an méid sin cúis
result.orig: Dhéanfadh leath an méid sin cúis
result.html: Dhéanfadh leath an méid sin cúisHalf of that amount would do.
result.ponchtml: Ḋéanfaḋ leaṫ an méid sin cúisHalf of that amount would do.

result.eng: I payed a half a thousand euro for this bicycle.
result.ga: Dhíol mé leathmhíle euro as an rothar seo
result.orig: Dhíol mé leathmhíle euro as an rothar seo
result.html: Dhíol mé leathmhíle euro as an rothar seoI payed a half a thousand euro for this bicycle.
result.ponchtml: Ḋíol mé leaṫṁíle euro as an roṫar seoI payed a half a thousand euro for this bicycle.

result.eng: I'll see you at half past nine.
result.ga: Feicfidh mé thú ag leath i ndiaidh a naoi
result.orig: Feicfidh mé thú ag leath i ndiaidh a naoi
result.html: Feicfidh mé thú ag leath i ndiaidh a naoiI'll see you at half past nine.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ mé ṫú ag leaṫ i ndiaiḋ a naoiI'll see you at half past nine.

result.eng: The rain will spread east during the day.
result.ga: Leathfaidh an bháisteach soir i rith an lae
result.orig: Leathfaidh an bháisteach soir i rith an lae
result.html: Leathfaidh an bháisteach soir i rith an laeThe rain will spread east during the day.
result.ponchtml: Leaṫfaiḋ an ḃáisteaċ soir i riṫ an laeThe rain will spread east during the day.

result.eng: The shop is only half a mile from my house.
result.ga: Níl an siopa ach leathmhíle ó mo theach
result.orig: Níl an siopa ach leathmhíle ó mo theach
result.html: Níl an siopa ach leathmhíle ó mo theachThe shop is only half a mile from my house.
result.ponchtml: Níl an siopa aċ leaṫṁíle ó mo ṫeaċThe shop is only half a mile from my house.

result.eng: It took me half a year to write the book.
result.ga: Thóg sé leathbhliain orm an leabhar a scríobh
result.orig: Thóg sé leathbhliain orm an leabhar a scríobh
result.html: Thóg sé leathbhliain orm an leabhar a scríobhIt took me half a year to write the book.
result.ponchtml: Ṫóg sé leaṫḃliain orm an leaḃar a scríoḃIt took me half a year to write the book.

result.eng: As the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.
result.ga: Mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíocht
result.orig: Mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíocht
result.html: Mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíochtAs the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.
result.ponchtml: Mar a leaṫ an tír siar amaċ ṫáinig níos mó stáit isteaċ san aontaċt nár ġlac le scláḃaíoċtAs the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.
